entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 19 with temperature falling to 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon.
